wikipedia_page.main: Amer Khan (born 21 February 1981 in Sheffield) is a  light heavyweight boxer based in Sheffield, England. He was a National Amateur champion and an undefeated former Central Area light heavyweight champion.

response: * Amer Khan – former undefeated light-heavyweight boxer, Central Area championship winner
